nodes.text: Ravi was a male individual who operated as a spice dealer on Mon Gazza. When Ravi heard word of Osmo Che's operations as a spice smuggler on Mon Gazza he placed a bounty on Che's head. The mercenary droid AD-W4 offered to get rid of Che, Ravi told AD-W4 that if he killed Che he would have paying jobs in his employ for life. Instead of taking up the job, AD-W4 then killed Ravi, painting the interior of his palace with the blood of his guards before taking Ravi's entire wealth for himself.
